3.7.7 -- 2019-02-25
-------------------

You can view the `3.7.7 milestone`_ on GitLab for more details.

Bugs Fixed
~~~~~~~~~~

- Fix crashes in plugins causing ``flake8`` to hang while unpickling errors
  (See also `GitLab!308`_, `GitLab#505`_)
